tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ingredients (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  calories INT,
  carbohydrates INT,
  protein INT,
  fat INT
);

CREATE TABLE ingredients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    calories INT,
    protein INT,
    fat INT,
    carbs INT
);

CREATE TABLE meal_plans (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255),
    ingredients_list VARCHAR(255),
    total_calories INT,
    total_protein INT,
    total_fat INT,
    total_carbs INT
);

CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name VARCHAR(255),
    calories INT,
    protein FLOAT,
    carbohydrates FLOAT,
    fats FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MealIngredients (
    meal_id UUID,
    ingredient_id UUID,
    amount FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (meal_id, ingredient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (meal_id) REFERENCES Meals(meal_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES Ingredients(ingredient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ingredients (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  calories INT,
  protein FLOAT,
  carbs FLOAT,
  fat FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ingredients (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  calories INT,
  protein DECIMAL(5,2),
  carbohydrates DECIMAL(5,2),
  fats DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE meal_ingredients (
  meal_id INT,
  ingredient_id INT,
  quantity DECIMAL(5,2),
  PRIMARY KEY (meal_id, ingredient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (meal_id) REFERENCES meals(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(id)
);

CREATE TABLE meal_plan_meals (
  meal_plan_id INT,
  meal_id INT,
  day INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (meal_plan_id, meal_id, day),
  FOREIGN KEY (meal_plan_id) REFERENCES meal_plans(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (meal_id) REFERENCES meals(id)
);
